page.title: 14ROCHESTER AIRPORT
page.content: The Airport buildings are owned by G.E.C. Avionics and the land by Rochester_Upon_Medway Council. Only {small aircraft}use the airport but We thought it would be like Heathrow with large airliners and suitcases everywhere.If an aircraft comes from {abroad}it has to land first at a bigger airport with customs officials. There were a lot of{old aircraft}being renovated.We saw a bi-plane which was a Tiger Moth,which looked like new.We also saw a Mirage and a Hurricane. The{control tower}was interesting,we all jumped,when the pilots radioed in because it was so loud.There is a {signal square}for pilots without radio it tells them with arrows and other signs what the landing conditions are. There is a{landing fee }of Â£4 for planes with one engine and Â£10 for those with two.
